problem_text_cn: 用边长为3的正方形厚纸板做了一套七巧板,现将它拼成一座桥(如图),那么这座桥的阴影部分的面积为()
problem_text_en: A set of jigsaw puzzles is made from square thick cardboard with edge length N_0, and now it is put together into a bridge (as shown in the picture), then the area of the shadow part of the bridge is ()
raw_answer: 解:读图可得,阴影部分的面积为原正方形的面积的一半,则阴影部分的面积为3×3÷2=4.5．故选:C．
